alert.note: Alert for Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Webster County through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1130 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Red Cloud, or 35 miles south of Hastings, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Cowles around 1140 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Guide Rock. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
